alert.note: Alert for La Plata (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 31 at 3:31PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Colorado, including the following county, La Plata. * WHEN...Until 500 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 331 PM MDT, satellite estimates indicate heavy rain from thunderstorms in the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hesperus.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
